Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires social media networks to verify the age of account holders
Summary: Requires social media networks to use a third party vendor to verify the age of new and existing social media account holders.
LawCode: Add ยง394-cccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring social media networks to verify the age of account holders
